mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.password, a.email, a.date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, a.phone_num as phoneNum, role, FROM user a WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user a ( a.id, a.name, a.password, a.email, a.date_of_birth as dateOfBirth, a.phone_num as phoneNum, a.role ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{phoneNum}, #{role} )
